name: Metal cycle
description:
Hello.
We are a team of beginner developers. Our team consists of 2 people. We present to your attention our idea.
The Metal Cycle game will be about a small toy robot that accidentally fell out of the window of a children's room and ended up in a dump on the other side of the city. He will have to travel across the city to his home. Various locations and various robots await him on the way.
At the moment there is only a prototype of this game, but we want to turn it into a full-fledged project.
Comments are welcome. If you would like to support us on the exciting journey of developing the game, we would be very grateful.
